title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: STEM-Based Science Education Design Capability Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science principles and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners independently design science education modules using STEM activity kits (e.g., UVC box experiments, digital pH meter construction)

Learners develop science education programs grounded in the six HIPs domains: structured instructional design, project-based learning, reflection, developmental progression, student-centered approaches, and TPACK
Learners create and share science education materials integrating technology tools in BYOD environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
